description.value:
Special: Necron Wep, Haywire (1)

Note: Always Best Quality. +2 to Haywire Roll, if Prolonged Deadzone effect occurs, is permenant until repaired with -30 Tech-Use Test or use of Luminen Capacitors. If attack hits opponent, next round instead of attacking wielder can make +0 Tech-Use Test do one of: 50m Tesla Carbine with Semi-Auto of DoS on Test, Remove TB Damage +1 per DoS on Test, or double one Necron within 5m's Regeneration.
